description: This source file defines a React component 'BlocksLibrary' that renders a UI for exploring various pre-defined UI blocks. It includes a catalog of blocks with metadata, previews, and code snippets, managed through state and memoization hooks. The component features a sidebar for navigation, dynamically displays selected block details, and integrates reusable components like Sidebar and PreviewCard.

methods.name: shell
methods.description: Helper function to wrap inner HTML content within a styled <section> block.

methods.name: BlocksLibrary()
methods.description: Main React functional component providing UI block explorer with sidebar navigation and preview display.
